name: Christofern
description:
In a world at the edge of oblivion, two plants stand side by side against a harsh landscape. But all hell breaks loose when one of them withers, and the other has to bear the cruelest gift of the cosmos: Loneliness. 

Join Christofern in a top-down RPG in a short story of vengeance and agony. With each mutation, watch him grow stronger and more bizarre. 

Controls: 

MovementW/A/S/DShoot/AimLeft Mouse Button (Mouse Aim)MeleeRight Mouse Button

Concept Art: Ayusha

Engine and Coding: fahim, furdzii, adwit
